# The `MCAsmParser` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Generic assembler parser interface, for use by target specific assembly parsers.

Definition at line 123 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/include/llvm/mc/mcparser/mcasmparser-h">MCAsmParser.h</a>.
